design_philosophy.vibe: Like a cup of hot chai on a rainy morning - comforting, familiar, and essential.
anti_patterns: No 'Task Completed' jargon -> Use 'Ho gaya! badhiya'
No pure black (#000000) -> Use Deep Charcoal
No bright 'Tech Blue' -> Use Earthy Terracotta

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-full shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 font-medium text-lg
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-full shadow-md font-medium

cards.base: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-3xl border border-border/40 shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.04)] p-6 transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.08)]

inputs.base: h-12 rounded-2xl border-border/60 bg-white/50 px-4 text-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary transition-all placeholder:text-muted-foreground/60

textures.noise: Make sure to add a subtle noise texture to the background to give it that 'handmade paper' feel.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4, ease: 'easeOut' }}
motion.micro_interaction: whileTap={{ scale: 0.95 }} transition={{ type: 'spring', stiffness: 400, damping: 17 }}

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' with strokeWidth={1.5} for a delicate, elegant look.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Mitti' and 'Tulsi' color palette provided above immediately.
2. FONT SETUP: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css at the very top.
3. HINGLISH FIRST: All default placeholder text and empty states must use warm Hinglish (e.g., 'Kya banega aaj?', 'Sabzi khatam?').
4. NO LOGIN: Ensure the app loads directly into the 'Home' screen. Use localStorage for all data persistence.
5. BOTTOM NAV: Implement a sticky bottom navigation bar with 4 clear tabs. It must be 'Glassmorphic'.
6. SOFT UI: Avoid all 1px sharp borders. Use soft shadows and muted backgrounds to define separation.
7. IMAGE USAGE: Use the provided image URLs for the 'Home' header (Morning Chai) and 'Empty List' states.
8. TOASTS: Use 'sonner' but style it to look like a friendly note, not a system alert.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays are recommended.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
